metadata.name: Titan Unravelling
metadata.description: The older one gets, the more one becomes aware of their mortality. Titan Unravelling explores that realization as the facade of invincibility starts to break down and we struggle to hold on to life. This living art piece started with the music, conveying power with the horns and strings, then delving into moments of the fragile beauty that remains. Collaborating with AI for the visual, I strove for an epic and organic image which I brought to life with animation and color.
